thread.title: Hardik’s detention sparks protests in Gujarat
thread.title_full: Hardik’s detention sparks protests in Gujarat

author: tribuneindia.com
title: Hardik’s detention sparks protests in Gujarat
text:
Ahmedabad, October 18
Sporadic protests took places at few places in Gujarat while one state transport bus was set on fire in Morbi district following detention of Patel quota agitation leader Hardik Patel ahead of the ODI between Indian and South Africa at Rajkot today. “Some unidentified persons set afire a stationed ST bus at Mahendranagar area on the outskirts of Morbi city today,” N S Malek, Inspector of B division police station in Morbi said, adding they were trying to trace the persons who are behind the incident. The officer said nobody was injured in the incident. Meanwhile, two incidents of protests were reported in Bardoli and Surat. Alpesh Kathiria, convener of Patidar Anamat Andolan Samiti in Surat held a demonstration at Kamrej area along with his supporters and tried to block NH 8, following which he was detained. Some people held an agitation in Bardoli town, but they soon called it off after police requested them not to resort to any kind of protest, said Bardoli town sub-inspector DR Vasava. — PTI
